channel.title: Updates on Fossinating
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Fossinating

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new sandbox game built as a part of the UNC Game Dev Club’s Collegiate Game Jam
Clear Recipes has been released in Beta!

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new bullet-hell built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new dungeon crawler game built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.

item.title: Live version taken down
item.description: The live version of the site will be down until the rewrite of the frontend is complete

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new adventure game built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.

item.title: 0.2 - Design Update
item.description: A major design overhaul finally including support for mobile devices

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new puzzle game built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.
Significant bug fixes, including one resulting in improperly loading saved games

item.title: Analytics Update
item.description: In an attempt to better understand the people who play chaindle, Google Analytics was added to track usage and key actions within the game
